name: jina_tool

brief.zh_Hans: 您的搜索底座，从此不同!

introduction:
# Jina AI

## Overview

Jina AI is an open-source neural search framework for building scalable, multimodal AI applications. It provides tools for indexing and retrieving diverse data, including the ability to segment webpages, fetch single pages, and search websites. It focuses on simplifying complex AI search functionalities, and making web data processing easier.

## Configuration

### 1. Apply for Jina API Key

Please apply for an API Key on the [Jina homepage](https://jina.ai/).

![](./_assets/jina_3.png)

### 2. Get Jina AI tools from Plugin Marketplace

The Jina tools could be found at the Plugin Marketplace, please install it first.

### 3. Fill in the configuration in Dify

On the Dify navigation page, click `Tools > Jina AI > To Authorize` and filling the API Key.

![](./_assets/jina_1.png)

### 4. Use the tool

You can use the Jina tool in the following application types:

#### Chatflow / Workflow applications

![](./_assets/jina_2.PNG)

Both Chatflow and Workflow applications support adding `Jina` tool nodes.

#### Agent applications

Add the Jina tool in the Agent application, then enter the online search command to call this tool.

help.en_US: Get your Jina AI API key from Jina AI (optional, but you can get a higher rate)
help.pt_BR: Obtenha sua chave de API do Jina AI na Jina AI (opcional, mas você pode obter uma taxa mais alta)
help.zh_Hans: 从 Jina AI 获取您的 Jina AI API 密钥（非必须，能得到更高的速率）

label.en_US: API Key (leave empty if you don't have one)
label.pt_BR: Chave API (deixe vazio se você não tiver uma)

placeholder.en_US: Please enter your Jina AI API key
placeholder.pt_BR: Por favor, insira sua chave de API do Jina AI
placeholder.zh_Hans: 请输入你的 Jina AI API 密钥

human.en_US: Split long text into chunks and do tokenization.

human_description.pt_BR: Dividir o texto de entrada em segmentos semanticamente significativos, enquanto lida com uma ampla variedade de tipos de texto e casos de borda com base em pistas estruturais comuns.

human_description.en_US:
· cl100k_base --- gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-3.5
· o200k_base  --- gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini
· p50k_base   --- text-davinci-003, text-davinci-002
· r50k_base   --- text-davinci-001, text-curie-001
· p50k_edit   --- text-davinci-edit-001, code-davinci-edit-001
· gpt2        --- gpt-2

name: firecrawl

brief.en_US: Firecrawl API integration for web crawling and scraping.
brief.zh_Hans: Firecrawl API 集成，用于网页爬取和数据抓取。

introduction: ## Overview **Firecrawl** is a powerful API integration for web crawling and data scraping. It allows users to extract URLs, scrape website content, and retrieve structured data from web pages. With its modular tools, Firecrawl simplifies the process of gathering web data efficiently. You can now use it in your application workflows for automated web data extraction and analysis. ## Configuration To set up Firecrawl, follow these steps: 1. **Install Firecrawl Tool** Access the Plugin Marketplace, locate the Firecrawl tool, and install it. 2. **Apply for a Firecrawl API Key** Go to the [Firecrawl API Keys](https://www.firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys) page, create a new API Key, and ensure your account has sufficient balance. 3. **Authorize Firecrawl** Navigate to **Plugins > Firecrawl > To Authorize** in Dify, and input your API Key to enable the tool. ![](./_assets/firecrawl-01.png) ## Tool Features The Firecrawl tool provides four actions for web crawling and scraping: ### Crawl Job Retrieve scraping results based on a Job ID or cancel an ongoing scraping task. This is ideal for managing and monitoring your workflows. ### Crawl Perform a recursive crawl of a website's subdomains to gather content. Perfect for extracting extensive datasets from interconnected pages. ### Map When using the **Map** action to generate a complete map of all URLs present on a site, you need to configure the following input parameters. ### Scrape Convert any URL into clean, structured data, transforming raw HTML into actionable insights. ## Usage Firecrawl can be seamlessly integrated into both **Chatflow / Workflow Apps** and **Agent Apps**. ### Chatflow / Workflow Apps Integrate Firecrawl into your pipeline by following these steps: 1. Add the Firecrawl node to the Chatflow or Workflow pipeline. 2. Please select one of Firecrawl's actions (e.g., Map, Crawl, Scrape) and insert it into the pipeline. 3. Define the input variables and UI elements for your use case. 4. Execute the pipeline to trigger the Firecrawl nodes sequentially and crawl web page data. ![](./_assets/firecrawl-06.png) ### Agent Apps Add the Firecrawl tool in the Agent application, then send the URL. The tool will help to scrape the online content, so the LLM will have the ability to get the latest online data. 1. Add the Firecrawl tool to the Agent application. 2. Input a URL in the chat, and Firecrawl will scrape the content from the specified webpage. 3. The extracted data is processed and made accessible to the LLM, enabling the app to fetch and analyze the latest online information. ![](./_assets/firecrawl-07.png)

placeholder.en_US: Please input your Firecrawl API key
placeholder.zh_Hans: 请输入您的 Firecrawl API 密钥，如果是自托管版本，可以随意填写密钥

description.en_US: Firecrawl API integration for web crawling and scraping.
description.zh_Hans: Firecrawl API 集成，用于网页爬取和数据抓取。

human.en_US: Retrieve the scraping results based on the job ID, or cancel the scraping task.
human.zh_Hans: 根据爬取任务ID获取爬取结果，或者取消爬取任务

description.llm: Retrieve the scraping results based on the job ID, or cancel the scraping task.

human_description.en_US: Set wait_for_results to false in the Crawl tool can get the job ID.
human_description.zh_Hans: 在深度爬取工具中将等待爬取结果设置为否可以获取Job ID。

parameters.llm_description: Set wait_for_results to false in the Crawl tool can get the job ID.
parameters.name: job_id

human_description.en_US: choose the operation to perform. `get` is for getting the crawl status, `cancel` is for cancelling the crawl job.
human_description.zh_Hans: 选择操作类型。

parameters.llm_description: choose the operation to perform. `get` is for getting the crawl status, `cancel` is for cancelling the crawl job.
parameters.name: operation

human.en_US: Recursively search through a urls subdomains, and gather the content.
human.zh_Hans: 递归爬取一个网址的子域名，并收集内容。

description.llm: This tool initiates a web crawl to extract data from a specified URL. It allows configuring crawler options such as including or excluding URL patterns, generating alt text for images using LLMs (paid plan required), limiting the maximum number of pages to crawl, and returning only the main content of the page. The tool can return either a list of crawled documents or a list of URLs based on the provided options.

human_description.en_US: The base URL to start crawling from.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要爬取网站的起始URL。

parameters.llm_description: The URL of the website that needs to be crawled. This is a required parameter.
parameters.name: url

human_description.en_US: If you choose not to wait, it will directly return a job ID. You can use this job ID to check the crawling results or cancel the crawling task, which is usually very useful for a large-scale crawling task.
human_description.zh_Hans: 如果选择不等待，则会直接返回一个job_id，可以通过job_id查询爬取结果或取消爬取任务，这通常对于一个大型爬取任务来说非常有用。

human_description.en_US: Pages matching these patterns will be skipped. Example: blog/*, about/*
human_description.zh_Hans: 匹配这些模式的页面将被跳过。示例：blog/*, about/*

human_description.en_US: Only pages matching these patterns will be crawled. Example: blog/*, about/*
human_description.zh_Hans: 只有与这些模式匹配的页面才会被爬取。示例：blog/*, about/*

human_description.en_US: Maximum depth to crawl relative to the entered URL. A maxDepth of 0 scrapes only the entered URL. A maxDepth of 1 scrapes the entered URL and all pages one level deep. A maxDepth of 2 scrapes the entered URL and all pages up to two levels deep. Higher values follow the same pattern.
human_description.zh_Hans: 相对于输入的URL，爬取的最大深度。maxDepth为0时，仅抓取输入的URL。maxDepth为1时，抓取输入的URL以及所有一级深层页面。maxDepth为2时，抓取输入的URL以及所有两级深层页面。更高值遵循相同模式。

human_description.en_US: Ignore the website sitemap when crawling.
human_description.zh_Hans: 爬取时忽略网站站点地图。

human_description.en_US: Specify the maximum number of pages to crawl. The crawler will stop after reaching this limit.
human_description.zh_Hans: 指定要爬取的最大页面数。爬虫将在达到此限制后停止。

human_description.en_US: Enables the crawler to navigate from a specific URL to previously linked pages. For instance, from 'example.com/product/123' back to 'example.com/product'
human_description.zh_Hans: 使爬虫能够从特定URL导航到之前链接的页面。例如，从'example.com/product/123'返回到'example.com/product'

human_description.en_US: Allows the crawler to follow links to external websites.

The URL to send the webhook to. This will trigger for crawl started (crawl.started) ,every page crawled (crawl.page) and when the crawl is completed (crawl.completed or crawl.failed). The response will be the same as the /scrape endpoint.
human_description.zh_Hans: 发送Webhook的URL。这将在开始爬取（crawl.started）、每爬取一个页面（crawl.page）以及爬取完成（crawl.completed或crawl.failed）时触发。响应将与/scrape端点相同。

human_description.en_US: Formats to include in the output. Available options: markdown, html, rawHtml, links, screenshot
human_description.zh_Hans: 输出中应包含的格式。可以填入: markdown, html, rawHtml, links, screenshot

human_description.en_US: Headers to send with the request. Can be used to send cookies, user-agent, etc. Example: {"cookies": "testcookies"}
human_description.zh_Hans: 随请求发送的头部。可以用来发送cookies、用户代理等。示例：{"cookies": "testcookies"}

human_description.en_US: Only include tags, classes and ids from the page in the final output. Use comma separated values. Example: script, .ad, #footer
human_description.zh_Hans: 仅在最终输出中包含HTML页面的这些标签，可以通过标签名、类或ID来设定，使用逗号分隔值。示例：script, .ad, #footer

human_description.en_US: Tags, classes and ids to remove from the page. Use comma separated values. Example: script, .ad, #footer
human_description.zh_Hans: 要在最终输出中移除HTML页面的这些标签，可以通过标签名、类或ID来设定，使用逗号分隔值。示例：script, .ad, #footer

human_description.en_US: Only return the main content of the page excluding headers, navs, footers, etc.
human_description.zh_Hans: 只返回页面的主要内容，不包括头部、导航栏、尾部等。

human_description.en_US: Wait x amount of milliseconds for the page to load to fetch content.
human_description.zh_Hans: 等待x毫秒以使页面加载并获取内容。

human.en_US: Input a website and get all the urls on the website - extremly fast
human.zh_Hans: 输入一个网站，快速获取网站上的所有网址。

description.llm: Input a website and get all the urls on the website - extremly fast

human_description.en_US: The base URL to start crawling from.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要爬取网站的起始URL。

parameters.llm_description: The URL of the website that needs to be crawled. This is a required parameter.
parameters.name: url

human_description.en_US: Search query to use for mapping. During the Alpha phase, the 'smart' part of the search functionality is limited to 100 search results. However, if map finds more results, there is no limit applied.
human_description.zh_Hans: 用于映射的搜索查询。在Alpha阶段，搜索功能的“智能”部分限制为最多100个搜索结果。然而，如果地图找到了更多结果，则不施加任何限制。

parameters.llm_description: Search query to use for mapping. During the Alpha phase, the 'smart' part of the search functionality is limited to 100 search results. However, if map finds more results, there is no limit applied.
parameters.name: search

human_description.en_US: Ignore the website sitemap when crawling.
human_description.zh_Hans: 爬取时忽略网站站点地图。

human_description.en_US: include Subdomains.
human_description.zh_Hans: 包含子域名。

human_description.en_US: maximum results.
human_description.zh_Hans: 最大结果数量。

human.en_US: Turn any url into clean data.
human.zh_Hans: 将任何网址转换为干净的数据。

description.llm: This tool is designed to scrape URL and output the content in Markdown format.

human_description.en_US: The URL of the website to scrape and extract data from.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要抓取并提取数据的网站URL。

parameters.llm_description: The URL of the website that needs to be crawled. This is a required parameter.
parameters.name: url

human_description.en_US: Formats to include in the output. Available options: markdown, html, rawHtml, links, screenshot, extract, screenshot@fullPage
human_description.zh_Hans: 输出中应包含的格式。可以填入: markdown, html, rawHtml, links, screenshot, extract, screenshot@fullPage

human_description.en_US: Only return the main content of the page excluding headers, navs, footers, etc.
human_description.zh_Hans: 只返回页面的主要内容，不包括头部、导航栏、尾部等。

human_description.en_US: Only include tags, classes and ids from the page in the final output. Use comma separated values. Example: script, .ad, #footer
human_description.zh_Hans: 仅在最终输出中包含HTML页面的这些标签，可以通过标签名、类或ID来设定，使用逗号分隔值。示例：script, .ad, #footer

human_description.en_US: Tags, classes and ids to remove from the page. Use comma separated values. Example: script, .ad, #footer
human_description.zh_Hans: 要在最终输出中移除HTML页面的这些标签，可以通过标签名、类或ID来设定，使用逗号分隔值。示例：script, .ad, #footer

human_description.en_US: Headers to send with the request. Can be used to send cookies, user-agent, etc. Example: {"cookies": "testcookies"}
human_description.zh_Hans: 随请求发送的头部。可以用来发送cookies、用户代理等。示例：{"cookies": "testcookies"}

human_description.en_US: Wait x amount of milliseconds for the page to load to fetch content.
human_description.zh_Hans: 等待x毫秒以使页面加载并获取内容。

human_description.en_US: Timeout in milliseconds for the request.
human_description.zh_Hans: 请求的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）。

human_description.en_US: The system prompt to use for the extraction.
human_description.zh_Hans: 用于提取的系统提示。

human_description.en_US: The prompt to use for the extraction without a schema.
human_description.zh_Hans: 用于无schema时提取的提示词

name: json_process

brief.en_US: Tools for processing JSON content using jsonpath_ng
brief.pt_BR: Tools for processing JSON content using jsonpath_ng
brief.zh_Hans: 利用 jsonpath_ng 处理 JSON 内容的工具

introduction:
# Overview
JSON Process is a group of tools able to insert, delete, replace and parse within a JSON data structure.

# Configure
## JSON Insert
JSON Insert tool adds a new value to a JSON object.

![](./_assets/json_insert.png)

## JSON Delete
JSON Delete tool deletes element in a JSON data sturcture.
![](./_assets/json_delete.png)

## JSON Parse
JSON Parse tool converts a JSON string into a JavaScript object or a Python dictionary, depending on the language being used.
![](./_assets/json_parse.png)

## JSON Replace
JSON Replace tool replaces values within a JSON object.
![](./_assets/json_replace.png)

name: regex

introduction:
# Overview
The Regex Extract tool is a utility that helps users extract specific patterns of text using regular expressions (regex).

# Configure
1. Install Regex from Dify Marketplace.
![](./_assets/regex_install.png)
2. Fill in Content to be extracted and Regular expression.
![](./_assets/regex_config.png)
![](./_assets/regex_test.png)

name: spider

brief.en_US: Spider API integration, returning LLM-ready data by scraping & crawling websites.

introduction:
# Overview
Spider is a web crawler for AI agents and LLMs provided by spider.cloud.
## Configure
### Get API Key
1. Create an account in spider.cloud.
2. Add sufficient fund to Spider.
3. Get an [API key](https://spider.cloud/api-keys).
![](_assets/spider_api.PNG)
Configure Spider tool
1. Install Spider from Marketplace. 
![](_assets/spider_install.PNG)
2. Add Spider node to your workflow.
3. Fill in the Spider API key.

placeholder.en_US: Please input your Spider API key

description.en_US: Spider API integration, returning LLM-ready data by scraping & crawling websites.

human.en_US: A tool for scraping & crawling webpages. Input should be a url.
human.zh_Hans: 用于抓取和爬取网页的工具。输入应该是一个网址。

description.llm: A tool for scraping & crawling webpages. Input should be a url.

human_description.en_US: url to be scraped or crawled
human_description.zh_Hans: 要抓取或爬取的网址

parameters.llm_description: url to either be scraped or crawled
parameters.name: url

human_description.en_US: used for selecting to either scrape the website or crawl the entire website following subpages
human_description.zh_Hans: 用于选择抓取网站或爬取整个网站及其子页面

human_description.en_US: specify the maximum number of pages to crawl per website. the crawler will stop after reaching this limit.
human_description.zh_Hans: 指定每个网站要爬取的最大页面数。爬虫将在达到此限制后停止。

label.en_US: maximum number of pages to crawl

human_description.en_US: the crawl limit for maximum depth.
human_description.zh_Hans: 最大爬取深度的限制。

label.en_US: maximum depth of pages to crawl

human_description.en_US: blacklist a set of paths that you do not want to crawl. you can use regex patterns to help with the list.
human_description.zh_Hans: 指定一组不想爬取的路径。您可以使用正则表达式模式来帮助定义列表。

human_description.en_US: Whitelist a set of paths that you want to crawl, ignoring all other routes that do not match the patterns. You can use regex patterns to help with the list.
human_description.zh_Hans: 指定一组要爬取的路径，忽略所有不匹配模式的其他路由。您可以使用正则表达式模式来帮助定义列表。

human_description.en_US: Use Mozilla's readability to pre-process the content for reading. This may drastically improve the content for LLM usage.
human_description.zh_Hans: 如果启用，爬虫将仅返回页面的主要内容，不包括标题、导航、页脚等。

label.en_US: Pre-process the content for LLM usage
label.zh_Hans: 仅返回页面的主要内容

name: github

brief.en_US: GitHub is an online software source code hosting service.
brief.pt_BR: GitHub é uma plataforma online para serviços de hospedagem de código fonte de software.
brief.zh_Hans: GitHub是一个在线软件源代码托管服务平台。

introduction:
# GitHub

## Overview

GitHub is a web-based platform for version control and collaboration, primarily used for software development. As a tool in Dify, it provides users the ability to search repositories by keywords.

## Configuration

### 1. Apply for API Key and Version

Please apply for an [API Key](https://github.com/settings/personal-access-tokens) and the [API version](https://docs.github.com/en/rest/about-the-rest-api/api-versions?apiVersion=2022-11-28).

### 2. Get GitHub tools from Plugin Marketplace

The GitHub tools can be found in the Plugin Marketplace. Please install it first.

### 3. Fill in the configuration in Dify

On the Dify navigation page, click `Tools > GitHub > Authorize` and fill in the API Key.

![](./_assets/github_1.PNG)

### 4. Using the tool

You can use the GitHub tool in the following application types:

#### Chatflow / Workflow applications

Both Chatflow and Workflow applications support adding a GitHub tool node.

![](./_assets/github_2.PNG)

#### Agent applications

Add the GitHub tool in the Agent application, then enter repository search instructions to call this tool.

![](./_assets/github_3.PNG)

placeholder.en_US: Please input your Github Access Tokens
placeholder.pt_BR: Insira seus Tokens de Acesso do Github
placeholder.zh_Hans: 请输入你的 Github Access Tokens

placeholder.en_US: Please input your Github API Version
placeholder.pt_BR: Insira sua versão da API do Github
placeholder.zh_Hans: 请输入你的 Github API Version

description.en_US: GitHub is an online software source code hosting service.
description.pt_BR: GitHub é uma plataforma online para serviços de hospedagem de código fonte de software.
description.zh_Hans: GitHub是一个在线软件源代码托管服务平台。

human.en_US: Search the Github repository to retrieve the open source projects you need
human.pt_BR: Pesquise o repositório do Github para recuperar os projetos de código aberto necessários.
human.zh_Hans: 搜索Github仓库，检索你需要的开源项目。

description.llm: A tool when you wants to search for popular warehouses or open source projects for any keyword. format query condition like "keywords+language:js", language can be other dev languages.

human_description.en_US: You want to find the project development language, keywords, For example. Find 10 Python developed PDF document parsing projects.
human_description.pt_BR: Você deseja encontrar a linguagem de desenvolvimento do projeto, palavras-chave, Por exemplo. Encontre 10 projetos de análise de documentos PDF desenvolvidos em Python.
human_description.zh_Hans: 你想要找的项目开发语言、关键字，如：找10个Python开发的PDF文档解析项目。

parameters.llm_description: The query of you want to search, format query condition like "keywords+language:js", language can be other dev languages.
parameters.name: query

human_description.en_US: Number of records returned by sorting based on stars. 5 is returned by default.
human_description.pt_BR: Número de registros retornados por classificação com base em estrelas. 5 é retornado por padrão.
human_description.zh_Hans: 基于stars排序返回的记录数, 默认返回5条。

parameters.llm_description: Extract the first N records from the returned result.
parameters.name: top_n
